name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-RUG-MODA8812
categories: Rugs > Area Rugs > Modern Rugs
title: Adalynn Abstract Performance Blue/Gray Area Rug
description: Anchor your living room or den in contemporary style with this abstract area rug. Power-loomed in Turkey from stain- and fade-resistant polypropylene, it showcases a striking abstract pattern in hues of navy blue, gray, and cream. Its 0.4" pile height makes it a perfect pick for busy spaces since it's easy to clean and holds up to high foot traffic. To keep this piece in place, we recommend pairing it with a rug pad.

name: projects/wayfairy/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFSOFA845NAVY
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Aislin 84'' Upholstered Sofa
description: Anchor your living room in classic, coastal style with this 84'' wide sofa. Crafted with a solid and engineered wood frame, this couch features track arms, a cushion back, and tapered block feet for a clean-lined silhouette. It's wrapped in a durable polyester blend upholstery in a rich navy hue, and its foam-filled cushions are supported by sinuous springs to help resist sagging over time. This three-seater sofa includes two bolster pillows for added texture and support. Assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFCMS88401
categories: Bed & Bath > Bedding > Comforters & Sets
title: Laurel Foundry Modern Farmhouse All-Season Reversible Down Alternative Comforter Set
description: Refresh your master suite or guest room with this essential comforter set, perfect for snuggling up on chilly nights. This set is crafted from hypoallergenic microfiber and filled with a plush down alternative, making it ideal for year-round use. The reversible design features a solid hue on each side, allowing you to switch up your bedroom's look in an instant. This set includes one comforter and two matching shams (one sham for Twin/Twin XL sizes). It's machine washable for easy care.

name: projects/wayfairy-dev/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WFSOFA84VELVETGRY
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Joss & Main Anya 84'' Velvet Square Arm Sofa
description: Anchor your living room in sophisticated style with this streamlined sofa. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this sofa strikes a clean-lined silhouette with a square back, track arms, and tapered block feet. Enveloped in plush velvet upholstery, this sofa features removable seat and back cushions filled with foam and synthetic fiber for comfortable support. This sofa has a weight capacity of 750 lbs. and requires simple leg assembly upon arrival.

text: Spot clean with a dry, solvent-based cleaner

name: projects/wayfairy-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/KW789PQR123
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets
title: Cuisinart Multiclad Pro Stainless Steel 12-Piece Cookware Set
description: Experience professional performance with the Cuisinart Multiclad Pro Stainless Steel 12-Piece Cookware Set. The elegant brushed stainless steel exterior and mirror-polished interior cooking surface look great and are easy to maintain. Heat Surround™ Technology allows for even heat distribution along the bottom and side walls of the cookware. Drip-free pouring rims and cool-grip handles provide comfort and control. This set includes everything a home chef needs: 1.5- and 3-quart covered saucepans; 8- and 10-inch open skillets; a 3.5-quart covered sauté pan; an 8-quart covered stockpot; and a steamer insert with lid.

name: projects/wayfairy-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/WF89721SF

name: projects/wayfairy-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF_BED_PLTFRM_GRY_Q_88192
categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Beds
title: Foundstone™ Aniyah Upholstered Tufted Platform Bed
description: Anchor your bedroom in modern style with the Aniyah Upholstered Platform Bed. Crafted from a solid and engineered wood frame, this bed features a clean-lined silhouette and a low profile, perfect for contemporary aesthetics. The rectangular headboard is upholstered in a durable linen-blend fabric and showcases classic button tufting for a touch of texture. Tapered solid wood legs provide a stable foundation. This bed includes a complete slat system, eliminating the need for a box spring. Simply add your mattress and bedding to complete the look. Assembly required.

name: projects/wayfairy/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-CT-88321
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Coffee Tables
title: August Grove Amalia Solid Wood Frame Coffee Table with Storage
description: Anchor your living room in rustic farmhouse style with this charming coffee table. Crafted from solid pine wood with a distressed finish that highlights the natural wood grain, this table brings a touch of warmth and character to any space. The spacious top surface is perfect for displaying decorative items, while the open lower shelf provides ample room for storing books, magazines, or cozy blankets. Its sturdy block legs and clean-lined silhouette make it a versatile piece that complements both traditional and modern aesthetics.

categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Andover Mills™ Calliope 84'' Square Arm Sofa with Reversible Cushions
description: Anchor your living room in classic style with this timeless sofa. Founded on a solid and manufactured wood frame, this dapper design strikes a clean-lined silhouette with a full backrest, track arms, and tapered block feet. The polyester blend upholstery is filled with foam and supported by sinuous springs to offer a medium-firm seating feel. Removable and reversible cushions make maintenance a breeze. name: projects/global/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WFWD8722A
categories: Decor & Pillows > Wall Decor > Wall Art
title: Joss & Main 'Abstract Seascape' - Framed Canvas Print
description: Bring a touch of coastal calm to your space with this serene 'Abstract Seascape' framed canvas print. Featuring a soothing palette of blues, grays, and sandy beiges, this piece evokes the tranquil beauty of the ocean's edge. The gallery-wrapped canvas is professionally stretched and mounted in a sleek, modern floating frame, creating a sophisticated and gallery-worthy look. Ready to hang with included hardware, this wall art is the perfect centerpiece for a living room, bedroom, or office, adding a peaceful and artistic focal point.

name: projects/acme-corp/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF_SOFA_88321
categories: Furniture > Living Room Furniture > Sofas & Couches
title: Callicoon 84'' Upholstered Sofa
description: Anchor your living room in classic, approachable style with this standard sofa. Built on a solid and engineered wood frame, it features track arms, a non-removable seat cushion, and loose back cushions for a clean-lined silhouette. It's upholstered in a polyester blend fabric and comes in your choice of neutral hue to blend in with your existing color palette. The cushions are filled with a down blend for a soft, sink-in feel that's still supportive. Plus, the seat cushion covers are removable for easy cleaning. Two included toss pillows add a finishing touch. Simple assembly required.

categories: Furniture > Bedroom Furniture > Dressers & Chests
title: Joss & Main Aviana 6-Drawer Solid Wood Double Dresser
description: Bring rustic charm and ample storage to your bedroom with the Aviana 6-Drawer Double Dresser. Crafted from solid pine wood with a distressed gray wash finish, this piece showcases the natural grain and texture of the wood. It features six spacious drawers on smooth metal glides, providing plenty of room for your clothing and linens. The drawers are accented with minimalist black metal hardware, adding a touch of modern industrial flair. A tip-over restraint device is included for added safety. Full assembly is required.

name: projects/wayfairy-catalog/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/WF-CKW-11PC-86021
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets
title: Cuisinart® Ceramica® XT 11-Piece Non-Stick Cookware Set
description: Elevate your culinary creations with the Cuisinart® Ceramica® XT 11-Piece Cookware Set. Engineered with an exclusive titanium-reinforced ceramic nonstick interior, this set offers enhanced food release and durability. The aluminum core ensures even heat distribution, eliminating hot spots for perfectly cooked meals every time. Tempered glass lids lock in flavor and moisture, while riveted stainless steel handles provide a secure and comfortable grip. This versatile set is oven safe up to 350°F and is free of PTFE, PFOA, and PFOS for healthier cooking.

name: projects/wayfairy/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/KPS789012C
categories: Kitchen & Tabletop > Cookware > Pots & Pans Sets

description: Upgrade your kitchen with the Cuisinart Ceramica XT 11-Piece Cookware Set. This comprehensive set includes everything you need for daily cooking, from frying and sautéing to simmering and boiling.
